ygData.subject: Re:  RE: [eqbards] ...but it's still easier than playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: ... few ... into one of ... I seem to remember you can get them in the sewers of Qeynos (vague memory fart :) but the normal place is uguk.  Not sure on
ygData.messageBody:
> So next question, where do you get them?
> Froglok's I'm figuring. But can I get them in the swap (one of the
few
> zones left that I really want to see someday) or do I have to go
into one of
> the Guks?
> Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, barely

I seem to remember you can get them in the sewers of Qeynos (vague
memory fart :) but the normal place is uguk. Not sure on Innothule
swamp.

Also, another vague memory, I seem to remember that we need a magical
instrument equipped to hit magical creatures, not magical gloves. I
could be wrong, but either way, it shouldn't be too hard to test...
Unfortunately, the easiest magical string instrument to get is the
Lute of the Gypsy Princess or a Gypsy Lute.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
